Header: A 12 year old girl commits suicide by hanging inside the house in Wallawaya
Content: A 12 year old girl from Wallawaya has committed suicide by hanging inside the house following a warning given by her school teachers. The 12 year old girl was a grade 6 student of the Wallawaya â€“ Malwaththawala national school. Teachers of the school have summoned the parents of the victim over a disciplinary hearing. The victim had told her friends that she would commit suicide. The body of the student is kept at the Wallawaya hospital and police investigations are under way.
